name: Bucketneers (4SeasonsGames)
description:
Arr, cap'n, welcome to bucketneers

Bail water out to reload the gun or you'll be a dead fish, use the water gun to throw water at the enemy ship so it sinks faster.

Sharin' this game and leaving a rate if you enjoyed it's highly appreciated. 

Creators:

@AndGarciaz -------------https://andgarciaz.itch.io/

 @CrisGarciaJ -----------https://cristiangj.itch.io/

This was made for the Ludum dare #40 

Theme: The more you have, the worst it is.
